game.name: Project DevourSlime
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Platformer– But You Can Steal the Platforms! Take control of the lab’s DevoSlime! Solve puzzles by sucking away the platforms, battle sinister lab machinery, rescue trapped companions, and evade deadly gas clouds… Strategize your own escape route and break free from the laboratory!"
game.shortDescriptionEn: Platformer– But You Can Steal the Platforms! Take control of the lab’s DevoSlime! Solve puzzles by sucking away the platforms, battle sinister lab machinery, rescue trapped companions, and evade deadly gas clouds… Strategize your own escape route and break free from the laboratory!"
